forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 51. South southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun dips beyond the horizon this evening, Downtown San Francisco enjoys a serene clarity, unmarred by fog, offering a crisp view of the city’s twinkling lights. The temperature settles around a comfortable 51 degrees, accompanied by a gentle breeze that whispers through the streets, barely noticeable but certainly refreshing. Tomorrow promises a sunlit day, with a high reaching 65 degrees before easing back to a cooler 61 in the afternoon. The skies will remain clear, inviting residents to embrace the warmth of the sun as it bathes their surroundings.

This is an evening to relish the moment—perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the soft murmur of the bay mingles with the laughter of those out for a nightcap. Dress comfortably, layering in a light sweater or jacket to ward off the autumn chill. Whether it’s the call of a cozy café or a quiet park to sit and reflect, the city embraces its denizens with open arms, ready to share the simple pleasures only a clear San Francisco night can provide.
